configuration.name: widget_07666895866126453
configuration.stem: What advantage does the white-faced marmoset gain by its mode of reproduction? Select all that apply?

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Does the marmoset reproduce asexually or sexually?
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Sexual reproduction provides genetic variation that may provide advantages to the marmoset if there are changes in the environment.

options.name: _widget_-037904304024500757
options.text: ability to colonize an area quickly

options.name: _widget_-09815753770588151
options.text: ability to adapt to changes in its environment
